project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API calls to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API call and data parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
